product_name: Hot ToolsPro Artist Black Gold 1" Micro Shine Flat Iron
summary: SummaryWhether you're styling sleek straight hair or effortless waves, the Hot Tools Pro Artist Black Gold 1" Micro Shine Flat Iron creates professional results.
details: DetailsBenefitsBlack Gold technology styling surface gets hotter, faster, and powerful to create extra smooth hair stylesPulse Technology keeps this iron hot and stays hot while in useFeaturesErgonomic, Cylindrical DesignRotating Temperature Dial27 Variable Heat Setting Up to 455 FAudible Tune when desired temperature is reachedOn/Off SwitchLED Temperature DisplayBONUS Heat Protective Glove Included9 ft professional swivel cordItem 2534051How To UseHOT TOOLS PRO TIP #1: Lazy WavesTo create the lived-in waves that everyone loves, divide your hair into vertical sections. Place a flat iron about midway along the section, holding the iron downward. Curl each section around the iron, simultaneously twisting the hair around the plates. At the end of each section, use the iron to straighten the ends for a true, lived-in vibe.HOT TOOLS PRO TIP #2: The Chase MethodThis trick produces ultra-sleek hair on coarse, curly textures. Start by dividing your hair into extremely fine sections. Place a fine-tooth comb at the scalp and slowly comb through the section. Place the flat iron right behind the comb and ''chase'' the comb along the section with the iron, all the way to the end.HOT TOOLS PRO TIP #3: Late for WorkIf you slept through your alarm and there's no time to flat iron your hair, here's a shortcut. Create a halo shaped parting from ear-to-ear and smooth the hair above the part. The surface will be sleek and shiny, and the full sections underneath will give your hairstyle loads of body!Precautions: Keep away from children. Do not use while bathing.Shipping & Coupon RestrictionsThis brand is excluded from most Ulta Beauty coupons.See brand eligibility details
how_to_use: HOT TOOLS PRO TIP #1: Lazy WavesTo create the lived-in waves that everyone loves, divide your hair into vertical sections. Place a flat iron about midway along the section, holding the iron downward. Curl each section around the iron, simultaneously twisting the hair around the plates. At the end of each section, use the iron to straighten the ends for a true, lived-in vibe.HOT TOOLS PRO TIP #2: The Chase MethodThis trick produces ultra-sleek hair on coarse, curly textures. Start by dividing your hair into extremely fine sections. Place a fine-tooth comb at the scalp and slowly comb through the section. Place the flat iron right behind the comb and ''chase'' the comb along the section with the iron, all the way to the end.HOT TOOLS PRO TIP #3: Late for WorkIf you slept through your alarm and there's no time to flat iron your hair, here's a shortcut. Create a halo shaped parting from ear-to-ear and smooth the hair above the part. The surface will be sleek and shiny, and the full sections underneath will give your hairstyle loads of body!Precautions: Keep away from children. Do not use while bathing.

reviews.headline: great but doesnt last long
reviews.comments: ive purchased 5 of these in the last 6 years.  they work great, until they stop heating up. they also tend to snag your hair after time.  They will last about a year.  My most recent one just died and I am trying a different brand. Not worth it for the price.

reviews.headline: Smooth and shiny
reviews.comments: I have had the same flat iron for the past 8 year, and I have faced frizzy hair time after time. I invested in this and wondered why I hadn't upgraded sooner. This is an AMAZING investment, and I'm already loving it.

reviews.headline: Quit after 1 year
reviews.comments:
This iron is not great for waves or curls. The glove was useless and not needed, at least for myself. Requires more than one pass to straighten. I have fine, already straight hair so mainly used for soft waves, flips, and fringe.
Iron randomly stopped working after a year. It would not turn on, or if I was able to turn on for a few seconds, it shut itself off. It was not used daily, so sat more than used. Was not impressed from the get go, but gave it a shot.

reviews.headline: Definitely recommend
reviews.comments: Tried a couple different ones before choosing this one.  Love the way it leaves my hair and you can also use it to curl your hair.  Would highly recommend this product.

reviews.headline: It was great… In the beginning
reviews.comments: When I purchased this in 2018 it was wonderful but then after that year it stayed stuck to one setting of hit which was the hottest. I never used the glove. Now that its 2025 the edges are dull and rusty and they got like that in 2023

reviews.headline: I would not buy this again
reviews.comments: I was initially very happy with this hair straightener—it worked great for the first two years and gave me smooth, sleek results. However, recently one side has completely stopped heating up, making it unusable. For the price, I expected better durability. Very disappointed and won't be purchasing from this brand.

reviews.headline: Best straightener
reviews.comments: I bought one of these a while back ago and it finally stop letting me change the temperature after years of use. I went to Ulta and purchased a 300 dollar straightener. It pulled out my hair and did not do better than this one, so I returned it and bought another one of these. I love this one and it makes my hair smooth, straight, and does not pull my hair out. Would highly recommend to everyone and the price is reasonable.

reviews.headline: Works nicely for straightening, waves & curls
reviews.comments: The only thing I wish it would do is 'lock' in the temp. My hand hits it constantly since its right at the base and just keeps twisting the temperature up and down. But I do like the fact that you can adjust the temp.

reviews.headline: Black Girl Hair Friendly!!!
reviews.comments: I love it so much! Was looking for a flat iron last minute since our stylist got sick and had to cancel. My hair is locd and I havent used a flat iron in a few years, but it was so easy to use and the results were AMAZING! I'm impressed and my 11 year old thinks her hair looks AMAZING!! She keeps saying how soft it is. If you have full, thick, coarse hair then get this flat iron. My daughter's hair is like a 4a. It gets really hot so the glove it comes with is definitely a plus!

reviews.headline: Black Girl Hair Friendly!!!
reviews.comments: I love it so much! Was looking for a flat iron last minute since our stylist got sick and had to cancel. My hair is locd and I havent used a flat iron in a few years, but it was so easy to use and the results were AMAZING! I'm impressed and my 11 year old thinks her hair looks AMAZING!! She keeps saying how soft it is. If you have full, thick, coarse hair then get this flat iron. My daughter's hair is like a 4a. It gets really hot so the glove it comes with is definitely a plus!

reviews.headline: Amazing tool
reviews.comments: Creates beautiful results

reviews.headline: Love it!
reviews.comments: This flat iron gets my 3c curly hair sleek, smooth and shiny. Definitely recommend using a heat protectant and be careful if you're new to straightening your hair because this is a powerful heating tool and will damage your hair if you do not know how to use it.

reviews.headline: BEST STRAIGHTNER
reviews.comments: by far one of the best straighteners… i love how i can straighten my hair and curl it at the same time. definitely reccomend !

reviews.headline: Definitely one of the best I've owned
reviews.comments: I have wavy, very frizzy hair and this straightens it very quickly and evenly! It heats up SUPER fast as well. Highly recommend.

reviews.headline: Good for curly hair!
reviews.comments: This works great for my super curly hair!

reviews.headline: Simply love it
reviews.comments: Easy to use and make my curly hair super straight.

reviews.headline: I would absolutely buy again!
reviews.comments: This is hands down the best flat iron I have ever used. I have had many brands and this one is the best! It heats quickly, straightens in one pass, and doesn't snag my hair.!

reviews.headline: love it! 4.5 years already and still going strong!
reviews.comments:
Bought this in 2020 during a gorgeous hair event and it is still going strong! Previously, I had a chi that had no temperature settings and it was noticeably frying my hair. I bought this because of the sale and wanted a flat iron with adjustable settings! I never need it above 300 and it's perfect for my hair! Super easy to straighten and curl but I will say the curls don't last as long as when I curl with my curling iron so something to keep in mind. 
I don't use it often maybe 1-2x a month if that! But it has lasted with no issues! Definitely recommend if you're thinking of a new flat iron!

reviews.headline: Hot tools es una marca maravillosa!!
reviews.comments: Tengo varios productos en los que a todos los recomiendo, excelente calidad, tamaño y el cabello te lo proteje.

reviews.headline: Best out of 7 others!
reviews.comments: Judge for yourselves. If i could upload pics i so would. Frizzy hair to sleek straight in 5mins!!!

faceoff_positive.comments: I just bough this straightener today and wow is an upgrade to my 6 year old straightener I had previously been using. It turns on super easily and heats up super fast (about 30 seconds or less). It also has a small screen to allow you to easily see the exact temperature it is set to. You can change the temperature with the barrel at the bottom of the straightener which is super simple and becuase it's not a button on the top it prevents you from accidentally changing the temperature at any time. I also love the floating plates. They allow for super smooth straightening. I can use this straightener at a lower temperature than I previously used which means I'm damaging my hair less. Also, after straightening my hair is so glossy and soft. I have hair that is on the straighter side (some ends cuve in and other parts of my hair like to go in many different directions), but I think this straightener would probably also work well for someone with wavier or curlier hair. The only thing I don't like about this straightener is that the mini screen on the straigthener will have the word off flashing when it's turned off and plugged in. The only way to make the flashing word to go away is if the device is unplugged which is a little annoying, but it's not really a problem with the device.
faceoff_positive.headline: Great!

faceoff_negative.comments: For starters, I have fine color treated hair with highlights, so i am very cautious with heat products and I use a leave in spray, hair oil and a heat protector and I never have an issue with frizz. This straightener was terrible! it snagged all through my hair. It did not matter if I used a brush or a comb. As others do, I read lots of reviews before making my purchase. Most Ultas around SD were sold out of this product, so it must be good right? The Chi for Ulta, which is cheaper, was the device I had before this one, works much better than this product. There is a review below (a lengthy one) that helped seal the deal to purchase this. I like Hot Tools curling irons, so I had high hopes for this one, but it ultimately disappointed. The pro to this device is it heats up really fast and the digital turn dial is pretty cool. The straightner is light and has a sleek body, but Hot Tools needs to improve the smoothness of the iron plates.
faceoff_negative.headline: Not impressed, disappointed, returning product

rollup.name: Pro Artist Black Gold 1" Micro Shine Flat Iron
